title: End Times and Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/25/19
itunes:title: End Times and Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/25/19
description:
George Noory and investigative mythologist William Henry discuss end times predictions and the growing use of smartphones and other technology, and whether this will change human evolution or even bring about the end of civilization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A look at the link between humans' overdependence on technology and how it could lead to our downfall.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
